query: SELECT u.id, u.name, COUNT(CASE WHEN e.courseId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as courses, COUNT(CASE WHEN e.bundleId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as bundles FROM users u LEFT JOIN course_enrollments e ON u.id = e.userId WHERE u.name LIKE '%Admin%' GROUP BY u.id, u.name;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT u.id, u.name, COUNT(CASE WHEN e.courseId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as courses, COUNT(CASE WHEN e.bundleId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as bundles FROM users u LEFT JOIN course_enrollments e ON u.id = e.userId WHERE u.name LIKE '%Admin%' GROUP BY u.id, u.name;
